column4: hello, i'm behind proxy server, how I can add key with command sudo apt-key adv --recv-keys --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com 7613768D ?
[pid 32005] connect(5, {sa_family=AF_INET, sin_port=htons(11371), sin_addr=inet_addr("91.189.89.49")}, 16) = -1 EINPROGRESS (Operation now in progress)
in your term type: export and paste that into pastebin.ca
seems gpg is ignoring proxy env
odd... does the proxy require authentication?
in strace I can see that gpg is trying to connect directly
can you wget a random URL? and see what happens?
hmm fixed sudo command cleared my https_proxy variable
